title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 865.4 - Special conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 865.4 - Special conditions

State Regulations

In the classification of these streams it is hereby noted
that the New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection has classified all
the waters in the watershed drainage basin in New Jersey as FW2 as contained in
the Water Quality Standards N.J. A.C. 7:9-4.1 et seq.dated August 1989. Therefore, the New York State Department of Environmental Conservation in
reviewing the plans for waste discharges in these drainage basins will take
into consideration the potable water supply use of these streams in the State
of New Jersey. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
865.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
